channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Illinois Coach Brad Underwood: Big Ten Has 'Always Been Pretty Dominant'
item.description: Illinois coach Brad Underwood believes the Big Ten is easily one of the most dominant leagues in men's college basketball.

item.title: 2026 NFL Coaching/GM Tracker: Broncos, Ravens, Titans Make Coordinator Hires
item.description: The coaching carousel for the 2026 offseason continues to churn. Here are the latest news and rumors from around the NFL!

item.title: 2026 MLB Free Agent Signings, Trades: Mariners Near Trade for Brendan Donovan
item.description: Keeping tabs on all of MLB's notable free agency signings, trades, and extensions ahead of the 2026 season.

item.title: Ranking the 9 Greatest Defenses in Super Bowl History
item.description: Can the 2025 Seahawks join the Legion of Boom among the greatest NFL defenses to appear in a Super Bowl? Here's the competition.

item.title: 2026 NFL Offseason Buzz, Rumors: Rams Extend HC Sean McVay, GM Les Snead
item.description: The NFL offseason hasn't officially arrived yet, but 30 teams are already looking ahead to 2026. Here's the latest offseason buzz and rumors around th...

item.title: AP Top 25 poll reaction: Arizona unanimous No. 1, Illinois in top five
item.description: The latest Top 25 poll is out, with a new top five. What's next for the ranked teams?

item.title: From seeing ghosts to the Super Bowl: Why the Jets' former GM believed in Sam Darnold
item.description: Mike Maccagnan and former teammates of Darnold talked openly and emotionally about their unwavering faith in the QB.

item.title: Super Bowl-bound Patriots follow in Mack Hollins' bare footsteps
item.description: How the eccentric receiver has become the heart of New England's locker room.

item.title: Way-too-early Grand Slam predictions for the rest of 2026
item.description: Carlos Alcaraz and Elena Rybakina are the newly crowned Australian Open champions. Who will win the rest of the majors? We make predictions.

item.title: Bracketology watch guide: The gap between the 1-seeds and the rest
item.description: Monday is a night for chipping away at the résumé (Kansas, Texas Tech, UNC), with a couple AQs on the line.
